views.markdown: If you need help with "Affinity", you can contact Steve Sarmiento, the developer, via e-mail.
Unknown is the maintainer of the package "Affinity". Please contact them via email for any questions on this version of the package.
If you found a mistake in the depiction or cannot download the package, you can reach out to the maintainer of the "Steve Sarmiento's Repo" repo, Steve Sarmiento.
